filename: 六年级下册英语重大版电子课本.pdf

chunks.content: 英 语 六年级 下册 （三年级起点） 义务教育教科书 总主编 艾一培 总主审 余渭深 Matthew Bloise 主 编 刘莉丽 编 者 刘莉丽 刘寅齐 陈春晖 龚志维 黄 宇 绘 画 赵 静 音 乐 杨胜松 英 语 六年级 下册 （三年级起点） 主 编 刘莉丽 责任编辑：牟 妮 版式设计：牟 妮 责任校对：邹 忌 责任印制：赵 晟 * 重庆大学出版社出版发行 出版人：饶帮华 社址：重庆市沙坪坝区大学城西路21号 邮编： 401331 电话：（ 023 ） 88617190 88617185 （中小学） 传真：（ 023 ） 88617186 88617166 网址： http://www.cqup.com.cn 邮箱： fxk@cqup.com.cn （营销中心） 全国新华书店经销 重庆升光电力印务有限公司印刷 * 开本： 787mm×1092mm 1/16 印张： 5.5 字数： 87 千 2002 年 8 月第 1 版 2015 年 12 月第 3 版 2019 年 12 月第 23 次印刷 ISBN 978 - 7 - 5624 - 8907 - 8 定价： 5.25 元 本书如有印刷 、 装订等质量问题 ， 本社负责调换 版权所有 ， 请勿擅自翻印和用本书 制作各类出版物及配套用书 ， 违者必究 朋友们，我们又见面了。让我们拉拉手，轻轻地说一声： “ 你好！ ” 我将再次牵着你的手，跟你一起走进英语学习的大门，去向小鸟学习唱 歌，去跟蓝天白云对话，去了解一片迷人的新天地，去结识更多的新 朋友。 我们将进入一个美好、神奇的儿童乐园。在这里，我们会融入种种奇 妙的情景中，学唱英语歌和英语童谣，学做游戏和画画，还要演一些简单 的英语小品，参加一些英语比赛。在这些活动中，你会自然地、愉快地学 会说英语，并记住许多英语单词。 你会发现，英语课是你最喜欢的课程。你就是课堂的小主人。老师和 同学一样，是一个平等的对话者。我敢肯定，你还会不时地拿起教鞭，神 气十足地当起小老师。 你的英语说得那么棒，你的英语歌唱得那么美，你的出色表现，一定 会得到老师的鼓励，同学们的赞美。在逐步提高英语听说能力的同时，你 的英语读写能力也会得到初步的发展，从而为进一步的学习打好基础。那 时候，你就能用英语跟 “ 老外 ” 交谈，用英语在超市购物，你还能用英文给 外国小朋友写信，让他们和你一起分享成功和快乐吧！ 当然，在学习中你也会碰到困难的。但不要忘了，还有我这个朋友 哦！我向你保证，我会永远帮助你、支持你。我们会永远在一起体验快 乐，迸发热情，增长知识，健康成长

metadata.source: 六年级下册英语重大版电子课本.pdf

chunks.content: ... I... What did you do last weekened? I... Dear Stanley, Happy winter holiday! No. 21, Nanjing Road, Shanghai, China Lucy 2 0 0 0 0 1 Post Card 11 Story corner Don’t watch TV all day long. One day in the summer holiday, Mum came back home after work. She saw Dongdong in front of the TV. Oh no, Mum! Please don’t turn off the TV. Time to do your homework. I did it yesterday. Then, read some books. I read one yesterday. Mum, did you buy any chocolates? Yes, I did. I bought some. May I have one? Sure, but wash your hands f irst. I washed them yesterday. Please give me the chocolate. No, you can’t have any today. Why? Because you had some yesterday. Listen and enjoy the story Act out the story with your friends 12 1. Look, listen and say A Terrible Day Unit 2 Lesson 1 Did you go boating last Saturday? I took her to the hospital by taxi. · It was a terrible day yesterday, Dad. · ·· · ·· ·· Take care of her. Mum didn’t feel well. She had a fever, and Dad was not at home. I took Mum to the hospital by taxi. The doctor asked her to stay in bed, drink some water and have some fruit. I took care of her. I did all the housework. I hope Mum will be better and Dad will come home soon. 1) What happened last night? Cultural clips A Food Pyramid Did...?Pupil 1Pupil 2Pupil 3Pupil 4 wash the clothes clean the rooms make the beds cook the dinner do the dishes take out the rubbish water the plants do shopping ... To keep healthy, you should eat... Yes, I did. Yes, I did. Did you wash the clothes last week? Did you do the housework last week? No, I didn’t. More rice, bread and vegetables. Less fat, less sugar. milk, cheese, yogurt fruits rice, noodles, bread vegetables chicken, f ish, beef fat and sugar More rice, bread Less fat, less sugar. Some chicken, fish, beef... 22 Story corner One day, Billy was on his way home, he heard a cry from the woods. Billy took the dog home. His father found the dog had a broken leg. Billy went over and saw a dog. The dog looked terrible. The next day, Billy took a photo of the dog and wrote a notice. They took the dog to a pet hospital. The vet (兽医) put a cast (石膏) on the dog’s leg. At last, Billy got a lovely puppy. He felt very happy. Two days later, the owner came and took the dog home. Listen and enjoy the story Act out the story with your friends Woof ! Woof ! Don’t be afraid. I can help you. What happened to the dog, Dad? One of his legs got hurt. Take good care of it. It is going to have puppies (小狗) . Good! I’ll take good care of it. You can have one of the puppies. Wonderful! This is for you. What a beautiful puppy! 23 Public Rules Unit 3 Lesson 1 1. Look, listen and say What does this mean? It means “don’t pick fl owers”. · Now children, read the farm rules first. · · Don’t climb trees

Listen and enjoy the story Act out the story with your friends Yes, it is. Good afternoon, madam! It’s a nice car. Do you see the sign here? Yes, I do. It reads “no parking”. So, I have to give you a parking ticket. But it is not my car. Oh, sorry, still I have to stick the ticket on the car. Look, your wife is coming. Yes, she is. Hello, dear. Happy birthday to you! Thank you, my dear. I have a present for you. Really? What’s it? Look, here it is. But you should drive it away. ... 34 Review 1 1. We can’t swim in the river. We should swim in the swimming pool. the green light. the swimming pool. 5) 6) 8) 9) 4) 7) 35 2. If there is no water, there is no life on the earth. People, animals, and plants all need water. We use water to grow food and cook meals. We use water to keep the grass green and the clothes clean. And we use water to clean our cars, houses and ourselves! Besides, we use water to get fun! Save water, save ourselves! 1) We use water to grow and . 2) We and . 3) We and . 4) Besides, . 5) Water is important , so we should . 48 6. Talk with your friends 7. Thank you for showing me what is right and what is wrong. I learned to be brave, honest and kind. I learned to help my parents at home and people around me. There are six pupils in our group. 60 What a good postman he is! Every day, Fred rides a bike with a postbag from one house to another. He sends letters and parcels (包裹) to people on time. Everybody likes him. One day, Fred sent a letter to an old man. He came to the gate and rang the bell. But there was no answer. He rang the bell again, still there was no answer. Fred tried to open the gate but a big dog ran to him. He was scared (被吓着的) and threw (扔) the letter over the fence. The dog picked up the letter with its mouth and carried it into the house. Listen and enjoy the story Act out the story with your friends Wow! Wow! This postman is better than me. Story corner Fred is a postman. He is a happy man. do // (过去式 did ) ......... 做，干 (1) down // ............ 向下，朝下 (4) drink // (过去式 drank ) ...... 喝 (1) driver // ............... 司机 (5) drop /ɒ/ .................. 滴；水珠 (4) E earth // ........................ 地球 (4) eat // (过去式 ate ) ............... 吃 (1) F fall /l/ ........................... 落下 (4) farmer // ............... 农民 (5) feed // ............... 喂养；饲养 (3) feel /l/ (过去式 felt ) ....... 感 觉 ；觉 得 (2) fever // .................. 发烧 (2) fight // ........................ 打架 (3) f inally /l/ ......... 最后，最终 (4) f inish // ............ 完成

chunks.content: ；有毛病 (2) Y yesterday // ......... 在昨天 (1) 72 73 Song time Let’s sing. Children’s Garden 7373 Let’s sing. 74 Show time Let’s read and act out. Once upon a time, cats didn’t catch rats. They were very lazy. Every day, they did only two things: eat and sleep. One day, a cat took a fish from a dog. The dog bit off ( 咬断 ) his tail. Why Do Cats Catch Rats? Ouch! My tail! Give back my tail. Oh, please! Please! Give back my f ish f irst. So the cat had to go to the f isherman for a f ish. What’s wrong with your tail, Cat? Hmm... I took a f ish from the dog and he bit off my tail. I have to give back his f ish, and he will give me back my tail. So I have to come to you. No problem, but give me a coat for the fish. So go to the tailor fi rst. 75 So the cat had to go to the woodcutter for a piece of wood. Hey! What’s wrong with your tail, Cat? Hmm... I took a fi sh from the dog and he bit off my tail. I have to give back his fish, and he will give me back my tail. I went to the fisherman, but he asked me for a coat. I went to the tailor, but he asked me for a piece of wood. So, I have to come to you. No problem. But give me a bag of rice for the wood. So go to the farmer fi rst. Hey! What’s wrong with your tail, Cat? Hmm... I took a fish from the dog and he bit off my tail. I have to give him back his fi sh, and he will give me back my tail. I went to the fi sherman, but he asked me for a coat. So, I have to come to you. So the cat had to go to the tailor for a coat. No problem. But give me a piece of wood for the coat. So go to the woodcutter fi rst. 76 So the cat had to go to the farmer for a bag of rice. Hey! What’s wrong with your tail, Cat? Hmm... I took a fi sh from the dog and he bit off my tail. I have to give him back his fi sh, and he will give me back my tail. I went to the fisherman, but he asked me for a coat. I went to the tailor, but he asked me for a piece of wood. I went to the woodcutter, but he asked me for a bag of rice. So, I have to come to you

chunks.content: . Hey! What’s wrong with your tail, Cat? Hmm... I took a fi sh from the dog and he bit off my tail. I have to give him back his fi sh, and he will give me back my tail. I went to the fisherman, but he asked me for a coat. I went to the tailor, but he asked me for a piece of wood. I went to the woodcutter, but he asked me for a bag of rice. So, I have to come to you. ??? It’s a deal! Hmm... I can catch rats. I’m good at this. No problem. But what can you do for me? 77 So, the farmer gave the cat a bag of rice. First, the cat carried the rice to the woodcutter and got a piece of wood. Then, he carried the wood to the tailor and got a coat. And then, he carried the coat to the f isherman and got a f ish. Finally, the cat got back his tail. He came back to the farm to keep his promise. 78 Best Wishes 79 To You
